description.value:
Requirements You've seen the target Cast a Spell

You use your hatred of magic to lash out at a known spellcaster. Make a melee Strike against the required creature. If you hit and deal damage, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} on a critical hit, until the beginning of your next turn.
